alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 09 at 12:34PM AKDT until April 10 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands east of Beaver and Twelve Mile Summit. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue into Monday, then taper off Monday afternoon. East of Beaver and Twelvemile Summit, 4 to 6 inches of snow are expected through Monday. Along the Dalton Highway 2 inches of snow are expected through Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
